DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study are to investigate the effect of intraocular pressure lowering efficacy and safety of DE-117 ophthalmic solution in subjects with primary open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension who are non-/low-responders to latanoprost ophthalmic solution.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assessing the Safety and Efficacy of DE-117 in Subjects With POAG or OH Who Are Non-/Low-responders to Latanoprost: FUJI Study
DOC.criteria: Primary open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension Patients at risk of progression of visual field loss Patients with severe visual field defect Patients with any diseases that preclude participation in this study for safety reasons
